item.title: Google calendar for LPSS colleagues
item.author: cyrusncy@gmail.com (CyrusN)
item.description: Add Calendar to mobile devices Login your LiPing domain account in the web browser first Go to www.google.com username: lpXXX@liping.edu.hk password: please ask ITAV team if you didn’t get the password Go to calendar view or press this link https://calendar.google.com/calendar Go to Other Calendar section and paste the link below to the box “Add a colleague’s calendar” liping.edu.hk_0jfuie399d0elvaac06k0hur8o@group.calendar.google.com Then you will see the word “School Calendar” under the Other Calendar section.
